name: Maquatic
description: A swashbuckling monkey pirate that's equally at home on land or sea. Wields a wooden staff and uses water-enhanced martial arts techniques.

ability.name: Buccaneer's Spirit
ability.description: Fighting moves get 25% power boost in water. Critical hits restore 25% of maximum HP.

moves.name: Aqua Jet
moves.description: A quick water attack that always goes first.

moves.name: Close Combat
moves.description: A fierce attack that lowers defense and special defense.

moves.name: Staff Strike
moves.description: Strikes with a wooden staff. May cause flinching.

moves.name: Surf
moves.description: Creates a huge wave that crashes down on the target.
